snippet.title: Salma Hayek  harvey weinstein amber heard frida kahlo good morning britain
snippet.description:
Salma Hayek  harvey weinstein amber heard frida kahlo good morning britain

Salma Hayek’s make-up free photo a hit with fans: ‘Refreshing not to see Photoshopped perfection’
While many of us shrink in horror when we clap sight of our make-up free faces via Zoom, Salma Hayek is more than happy to put her natural beauty front and centre.

Proving once again that she’s hardly aged a day in decades, the 53-year-old actor shared a fresh-faced selfie taken in the pool on Instagram last night.

“Agua,” she captioned the snapshot of her in a magenta swimsuit emerging from a pool, adding the hashtag #nomakeup as proof she’d forgone the foundation.

Fans couldn’t get enough of her au natural pool post with the update quickly clocking up over 700K likes and thousands of comments praising her.

“Absolutely beautiful,” one fan wrote, while another commented simply: “Flawless”.

“I love that you post REAL natural photos, refreshing to not see photoshopped perfection. Thank you,” yet another user added.

Read more: Amanda Holden wears denim dress from Michelle Keegan's Very range



Read more: Kim Kardashian, Bella Hadid and Victoria Beckham showcase impressive quarantine style

It isn’t the first time Hayek has offered proof she seems to be ageing backwards, sharing another bare-faced selfie with her 14.6 million Instagram followers last month.

This time the Oscar-nominated actor showcased her timeless complexion while looking casual in a soft purple T-shirt with the word ‘grateful’ emblazoned across the front.

The star has previously opened up about her beauty regime, revealing make-up free days are her best days.

“My favorite [sic] days are the days that you're not wearing makeup, and you're not looking in the mirror because you're not thinking about how you look,” she said in People's Beautiful Issue.

“You’re just present, and you’re just doing your thing.

“And this is the best thing about not wearing makeup, when you’re not thinking, ‘How do I look without makeup? Oh, I forgot to put makeup.’ When you’re just living life, and this is not your priority.”...................................................................................................
